overview_of_class: Heavy emphasis on the basic mathematics underlying financial concepts, including present value and future value of lump sum and annuities. We will then explore how this mathematical foundation helps us to value stocks and bonds. We will then turn our attention to how the same fundamentals help managers to evaluate whether to invest in a proposed project or not. Wrapping it up, we will consider how financial professionals view risk and how risk considerations are accounted for in evaluating investments in real or financial assets. Throughout the course, we will consider what role finance plays in the world economy.
name: Introduction to Finance
subject: FINANCE
